title: Cannot Launch LoL
body:
Hi,

For the past few days I've had trouble getting the launcher to actually launch. When I double-click the icon to launch the launcher, nothing happens. No icon, nothing. The only way I've been able to actually play LoL at all is by re-installing the game every time I want to play.

Windows 10 and drivers are all fully up-to-date, and I've googled and tried every solution I could find including this own forums "common fixes" page ( https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here )

Any ideas what could be causing this or anyone know of a fix that will actually work?

Thanks.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If none of the common fixes worked they'll probably have to ask for logs or such to look deeper.
